meanings.sent1: The dog left some jobbies in the yard.
meanings.sent2: Please clean up after your pet's jobbies.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped in some jobbies on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent4: The smell of jobbies filled the room.
meanings.sent5: The toddler proudly showed off his jobbies to his parents.

meanings.definition: A slang term for tasks or work.
meanings.sent1: I have a lot of jobbies to complete before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: She tackled her jobbies one by one to finish the project.
meanings.sent3: The pile of jobbies on my desk seems never-ending.
meanings.sent4: His jobbies were like a mountain he had to climb every day.
meanings.sent5: The jobbies at the office kept piling up, causing stress.
